decks.notes: The main concept of this deck is to use various cards to power up your creatures, especially Basking Broodscale and Glaring Fleshraker, while also using Eldrazi creatures and artifacts to control the board. By combining powerful creatures with spells like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble, you aim to overwhelm your opponent and secure victory. The deck also leverages Urza's Saga to search for key pieces and accelerate your game plan. Additionally, using Boseiju, Who Endures can help ensure that your important spells resolve without interference from your opponent.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures and control the board with spells like Kozilek's Command and Malevolent Rumble. It utilizes cards like Sowing Mycospawn and Icetill Explorer to accelerate mana production, while also including strong finishers like Emrakul, the Promised End and Sire of Seven Deaths. The deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with big threats while disrupting their game plan with removal spells and land destruction.

The main concept of this Boros Aggro deck is to quickly establish board presence and tempo through aggressive creatures and efficient removal spells. The deck aims to pressure the opponent early and maintain a steady stream of threats to overwhelm them. Cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer provide strong aggression, while cards like Seasoned Pyromancer and Goblin Bombardment offer additional value and reach. The inclusion of disruptive cards like Blood Moon can also disrupt the opponent's game plan and secure victories. Overall, the deck focuses on aggression, tempo, and disruption to secure wins.

This deck focuses on putting pressure on the opponent with aggressive creatures while disrupting their game plan through taxing effects. It aims to control the board by using removal spells and bouncing opponent's threats. The deck also has a few versatile spells to deal with various threats. The creatures in the deck are powerful and can close out the game quickly if left unchecked. The deck is designed to have a proactive game plan by being aggressive while also disrupting the opponent's strategy.

This deck focuses on quickly playing artifacts to overwhelm the opponent with a strong board presence and aggressive plays. Utilizing cards like Emry, Lurker of the Loch to recur artifacts and Urza's Saga to search for key pieces, the deck aims to control the board while dealing damage efficiently. Cards like Memnite and Ornithopter help to quickly establish a board presence, while Kappa Cannoneer and Pinnacle Emissary provide additional aggression. Claws of Gix and Weapons Manufacturing can be used to disrupt the opponent's strategy, ensuring a fast and powerful victory.

This deck focuses on assembling a powerful combo utilizing Emry, Lurker of the Loch, Kethis, the Hidden Hand, and Grinding Station to mill your own deck and generate infinite mana and card advantage. By recurring artifacts and legendary creatures from your graveyard, you can quickly assemble the pieces you need for the combo. Jace, the Perfected Mind is included as a win condition once you have milled yourself sufficiently. The deck also includes disruption in the form of counterspells and bounce effects to protect your combo pieces.

The key strategy of the deck is to quickly establish board presence and control with efficient and flexible spells, while utilizing card draw and scrying effects to maintain consistency. This UR Aggro deck focuses on tempo plays and disrupting opponents, attempting to overwhelm them with a mix of creature threats and burn spells. By combining aggressive creatures like Murktide Regent and Cori-Steel Cutter with powerful spells like Lightning Bolt and Counterspell, the deck aims to apply pressure and win the game before the opponent can stabilize.

The deck focuses on ramping up mana quickly using UrzaTron lands to cast powerful Eldrazi creatures like Thought-Knot Seer and Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger. It controls the board with cards such as Karn, the Great Creator and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms while also having removal spells like Dismember. The goal is to overwhelm the opponent with massive threats while disrupting their game plan, leading to a victory through overwhelming power and control.

The main concept of this deck is to control the game using powerful Eldrazi creatures and devastating colorless spells, while also utilizing the UrzaTron lands to generate massive amounts of mana. By ramping up quickly and disrupting the opponent's strategy with Thought-Knot Seer and Karn, the Great Creator, this deck aims to overpower the opponent and secure victory with powerful finishers like Ulamog, the Ceaseless Hunger and Ugin, the Eye of the Storms. The inclusion of Vexing Bauble and Dismember adds flexibility and disruption to further control the game.

Utilize powerful Eldrazi creatures and disruptive cards to quickly overwhelm your opponent and disrupt their game plan. Use cards like Thoughtseize and Inquisition of Kozilek to control your opponent's hand while deploying efficient threats like Thought-Knot Seer and Nethergoyf. The inclusion of Urza's Saga and Mishra's Bauble provides additional flexibility and card advantage. With a streamlined mono black aggro strategy, this deck aims to apply pressure from the start and maintain control throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize artifacts to quickly overwhelm the opponent with aggressive creatures and powerful spells. By combining cards like Mox Opal, Urza's Saga, and Engineered Explosives, the deck aims to generate a lot of value and apply constant pressure on the opponent. With a mix of artifact creatures, spells, and lands that can create tokens, this deck seeks to establish a strong board presence and outpace the opponent in the early stages of the game. Additionally, cards like Metallic Rebuke and Sink into Stupor help to disrupt the opponent's game plan and ensure victory.

This Boros Aggro deck focuses on aggressive creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls to quickly overwhelm the opponent. It also utilizes burn spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to deal direct damage and control the board. Ajani, Nacatl Pariah provides additional support while Phlage, Titan of Fire's Fury acts as a powerful finisher. The deck also includes cards like Blood Moon and Thraben Charm for disruption and protection. With a mix of creatures, burn spells, and disruption, this deck aims to win the game quickly through aggressive tactics.

The main idea of this Ruby Storm deck is to generate a large amount of mana quickly using cards like Ruby Medallion, Pyretic Ritual, and Manamorphose, while also using Ral, Monsoon Mage and Reckless Impulse to draw through the deck. The deck aims to cast a large Past in Flames to recast all of its cheap spells from the graveyard and eventually win the game with a big Grapeshot. Additionally, the deck can use cards like Glimpse the Impossible and Strike It Rich to dig for key pieces and potentially combo off early in the game.

The main concept of this UW Control deck is to control the game through a combination of counterspells, removal, and card advantage. The deck aims to stall the opponent's game plan with cards like Orim's Chant and Teferi, Time Raveler while setting up its own win conditions such as Narset, Parter of Veils and Teferi, Hero of Dominaria. It also has ways to generate card advantage with cards like Meticulous Archive and Consult the Star Charts. The deck is designed to disrupt the opponent's strategy and outvalue them in the late game.

The deck focuses on aggressive plays with a mix of creatures and spells to quickly deal damage to the opponent. It utilizes powerful creatures like Ragavan, Nimble Pilferer and Guide of Souls, along with removal spells like Galvanic Discharge and Goblin Bombardment to control the board. It also includes utility cards like Ajani, Nacatl Pariah and Seasoned Pyromancer for added versatility. The mana base is built around fetch lands and dual lands to ensure consistent access to the deck's color requirements. Overall, the deck aims to overwhelm the opponent with fast and efficient threats.

The deck focuses on utilizing a combination of creatures and spells to quickly generate tokens and deal damage to the opponent. By sacrificing creatures like Gravecrawler and Shambling Ghast, and using cards like Phoenix Fleet Airship and Marionette Apprentice, the deck can create a steady stream of threats and overwhelm the opponent. The inclusion of cards like Thoughtseize and Cling to Dust also provide disruption and control elements to the strategy. Overall, the deck aims to win through a powerful synergy of sacrifice effects and creature abilities.
